mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, type, code, status, resource_id
mapper.select:
select p.id, p.type, p.code, p.resource_id from iam_permission p inner join iam_permission_role_rel prr on p.id = prr.permission_id where p.type = #{type} and prr.role_id in
#{item}
select up.id, code from iam_permission up inner join iam_permission_role_rel uprr on uprr.permission_id = up.id where role_id = #{roleId} and up.type = #{type} and up.status = 1 and up.is_deleted = 0

select up.id permissionId, up.code permissionCode, up.type permissionType, ua.id apiId, ua.name apiName, ua.uri apiUri, ua.method apiMethod, ua.auth_type apiAuthType from iam_permission up inner join iam_api ua on ua.id = up.resource_id where ua.is_deleted = 0 and up.status = 1 and up.id in
#{item}

select up.id permissionId, up.code permissionCode, up.type permissionType, ua.id apiId, ua.name apiName, ua.uri apiUri, ua.method apiMethod, ua.auth_type apiAuthType from iam_permission up inner join iam_permission_role_rel uprr on uprr.permission_id = up.id inner join iam_api ua on up.resource_id = ua.id where up.type = 'SER_API' and up.is_deleted = 0 and ua.status = 1 and up.status = 1 and uprr.role_id in
#{item}
